amendatorysection.para: Primary place of use means: (1) For users of wireless service other than prepaid wireless service, the street address representative of where the use of wireless service primarily occurs. The place of primary use shall be the residential street address or the primary business street address of the user of the wireless service and shall be within the service area of the home service provider; and (2) for users of prepaid wireless service, the location associated with the telephone number assigned to the user.
